O3vsPM2explainConfidence: The Predicted and the Observed results of the diagram are more similar
NOvsPM1explainConfidence: Predicted and Observed models are nearer together, see in the diagram in the right bottom
TIMEvsTRAFFICvsSOUNDexplainConfidence: When I choose time, the predicted and observed results are almost similar. The worst result (biggest difference we have with the predictor traffic
neg[SQ001]: gute Darstellung im Bezug auf die "pollution"
neg[SQ002]: Wechsel zwischen traffic, time, sound, sowie den Luftverschmutzern funktionierte sehr gut (ausserdem sehr interessant)
neg[SQ003]: Die Diagramme waren leicht verständlich (gut dargestellt)
pos[SQ003]: Man könnte den Wechsel der Ansichten direkt in einer Sidebar realisieren, statt erst die Optionen öffnen zu müssen
adv: Die Visualisierung erleichtert das Verständnis extrem, da mehr Sinne angesprochen werden und der Nutzer sich alles besser vorstellen kann.
comments: Insgesamt eine sehr spannende App, die für wissenschaftliche Arbeiten sehr hilfreich sein könnte

TIMEvsTRAFFICvsSOUNDexplainConfidence: With the Predictor "Time", the fewest purple dots have been seen compared to the other Predictors.  I compared this observation with the table and confirmed it.
neg[SQ001]: easy selection of the different options (view, air pollutant, predictor)
neg[SQ002]: new view to compare variables. A view which was not known to me before. Nevertheless, as a safeguard, the comparison by the table
pos[SQ001]: In the legend the colors are vertically very close to each other, this can be confusing if you think of an addition
pos[SQ002]: Name in table and legend not only the unit of the parameter but also the parameter itself
adv: Making otherwise invisible parameters visible. You can dynamically change parameters and settings and thus understand the paper much easier.
dis: I can imagine that it means a certain additional effort to provide the paper or the corresponding data for such an application

comments:
Introduction vielleicht auch auf Deutsch anbieten 
Farbe der Punkte individuell einstellbar

O3vsPM2explainConfidence: the difference of the point density is significant less
NOvsPM1explainConfidence: the difference of the point density for nitrogen monoxide is around 1 thousand and for PM1 around 6 thousand
TIMEvsTRAFFICvsSOUNDexplainConfidence: The difference between observed and predicted is minimal for the time model. For the other prediction models the difference is more than thousand
pos[SQ001]: the text in the top of the overlay view is not always visible
pos[SQ002]: the bar in the middle is a bit small (usability not the best)
adv: The user can actually see the topic visualized so he can relate and analyze the situation better. Also a person is more likely to look at an app than to read a paper
dis: On the paper you have the exact graphic you want and the explanation for it, while on the app you would have to switch back to the introduction and click through that
